entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -22.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 5:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -22.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -27.4°C
Wind: WSW 44 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
